website_summaries.verdict: This two-speed food processor is a good value for basic chopping and gets the job done quickly.
pros: The 10-cup work bowl has a locking lid
Two speeds and pulse control buttons
Large-mouth food chute with food pusher
Suction cup helps it stay in place on counter
cons: Not good for items like warm cheese, hardboiled eggs, or marshmallows

customer_reviews.title: Great function but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It is lightweight, sturdy and fast. Cons: 1 - Bogs down at the end of shredding cheese because the last end of the cheese binds the blade a bit. 2 - Food particles (from the aforementioned cheese) get stuck in the enclosed housing of the safety spring and cannot be cleaned out. Moist foods get packed into the interior channel of the lid and must be removed with a small, makeshift implement.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: A great processor with a large capacity cup, quite easy to clean. The dough blade is fantastic, especially for the price. I could not find another processor or mixer with a dough blade for less than $200. This processor makes an excellent housewarming or wedding gift. See my video showing how to place and lock the mixing cup on the processor. Always start with the container from the 4 o'clock hour position towards the 5 o'clock position. Add blades, then repeat the process with the lid, again from the 4 o'clock hour position towards the 5 o'clock position.
customer_reviews.author: MasterSergeantDisabledVet

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Black & Decker model that broke. That model was so loud, I really didn't like it. I was worried this model would also be loud based on the reviews I read, but the sound is not bad at all. I love the large bowl and it is very easy to operate and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Finn11

customer_reviews.title: For the Price An Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We use low to moderate priced food processors because our housekeepers are not as careful with them as they could be, and they seem to break too often, regardless of price. We have tried several different brands including private labels and Hamilton Beach. This Oster is by far the best!! Powerful motor which accomplishments most jobs with no straining whatsoever. Extremely rapid processing times. Excellent product at a even better price point!
customer_reviews.author: MiraBella

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and your time
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst design on a food processor that u could imagine, to snap the bowl and lid together u have to be a genius, I bought 2 one for my dad and 1 for me my dad can not put his together it takes me forever to get mine locked together to use it, it has a little plastic like button that comes loose that ends up in the bowl with the food u r processing, I bought these 2017 for Christmas after trying to process strawberries yesterday I am ordering me a different one
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Works well, cleaning is tricky
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, but hard to clean the lid where the food pusher locks in. Used it to grate cheese, and some got in that section. Not even using a straw brush and an extra hand to press the lock mechanism open could I get it out. :( The rest cleans easily, and I like that you can store all the parts in the bowl. I also like that if you have to store the motor and bowl separate, the motor doesn't have the spindle sticking up, so you can store it in a shorter space.
customer_reviews.author: Magpie

customer_reviews.title: Very Bad Blades and cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday and it is not easy to understand the working and takes some time to figure this out to make sure we lock everything before it starts. tried to mix a dough and it started off well and about 15 minutes the dough was mixed well, but the problem is the plastic kneader broke on side and the dough was filled with plastic. Did not know this until we took the dough out. This is a piece of waste plastic material. I have an blender from Oster and that never had any issues for two years now. But I think this is not worth the 40$ spent. Returned on day two to the seller
customer_reviews.author: Srilesh

customer_reviews.title: Good processor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great processor that works very quickly. I've only used it to slice, chop, and dice food items. It doesn't have the biggest mouth for larger food items, so chopping/dicing is typically needed before food can go down the shute. The other small downside I've noticed is that tiny particles of food somehow made its way into the handle, and you would have to dismantle it (potentially not be able to reassemble) in order to clean out properly. I've worried that the food can get stuck and start to mold. (Yuck)
customer_reviews.author: Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: SO DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: First Amazon sent me two. I guess that's my fault. So the size was nice the attachment's too. Was so excited to shred some cheese! And it didn't work! I tried to problem solve couldn't figure it out. So I opened the second one! And Yup you guessed it. It didn't work either. Yes I tried different plugs. I even reset all of the breakers before I had my melt down 😂. So long story short. I didn't like them. Now I'm sending them back. Getting a refund for one. They are sending me a replacement. So I'll let you know how it goes! SO disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Boom Boom POW

customer_reviews.title: It has a large capacity bowl and the parts are easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This Oster food processor is very powerful and able to handle most chopping and slicing jobs with ease. It has a large capacity bowl and the parts are easy to clean. Really like that this model comes with a dough hook that is very helpful in mixing thick batters or kneading bread dough. Very high quality with a low price point. Well worth price.
customer_reviews.author: Hensmama

customer_reviews.title: 10-Cup Food Processor
customer_reviews.text: I love my food processor. This was certainly the right one for me. It was in original box and sealed properly. All parts were there and sealed well. Easy to use and right away I started making dishes I had in mind. Just make sure you don't overflow or over stuff it. It will spill. The base has suction and it stays still. I love the part where the cord is attached and can be tucked inside the special nook on the base. No more extra cord to coil or store. You won't lose it this way. I made dough just fine. Even pesto. Follow instructions well and your machine will last.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cappy

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and was very satisfied with the outcome...tried it again another day and it wouldn’t work...tried several outlets and then got a replacement from amazon. Plugged it up, threw the food in there and again, nothing. At this point i thought ‘i can’t have such bad luck that i got 2 defect items in a row! They’re brand new!’...read the instructions and it turns out it won’t start until i put the black chute on there, out of safety reasons. I feel so silly, sorry Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: J. Neilson

customer_reviews.title: Made my Canning Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This food processor is powerful piece of kitchen equipment. Very easy to assemble and super easy to clean. This is something I will not be keeping on my counter just because it is somewhat large for me. I purchased to help with canning this year and it made that process very easy. You do have to line all the handles up when working the machine otherwise it will not start. This is a built in safety feature. Quick delivery from Amazon as usual. I found this an excellent buy, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on march 25th, 2018, and I had used it only three times for making peanut butter and it worked perfectly. However, today, when I was going to turn it on to make my pranut butter, it did not turn on, it did not want to work, and I don't understand why or which is the problem. Can somebody help me? Who should I claim for the defective product I bought, or to whom can I ask for help?
customer_reviews.author: Viviana

customer_reviews.title: Regret Purchasing..
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this item for a few months now and ive had the most difficult time getting it to work. Its finicky as to how the container is slipped into place with the lid in order to work. Now it has stopped completely. Its been used less than 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: KIerston Oldroyd

customer_reviews.title: I would tell you how it works...if it DID work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product in March. I opened it up and stored it in my pantry until September . I bought it specifically for pies and cookies that I make. It does not work at all!!!! I have never used it until now, but it will not turn on at all. Very unhappy with it. Now, it appears too late to return it. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Handzel

customer_reviews.title: A gift that gives back yummy results
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an early Christmas gift and have benefitted by getting homemade bread, pies with homemade crust, and casseroles. I watched this slice and shred vegetables it was Fast! all the slices were very uniform in thickness and when shredding the machine was very efficient at producing a consistent size. I asked about the dough making process and was told this machine makes it easy to make bread dough so more loafs are made. In one week I was told it made five loaves worth of dough and 2 pie crusts. It looks easy to use and well made.
customer_reviews.author: WSWIII

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for 3 months and then it stopped working out of nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eda Uykal

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: When I got married thirty two years ago my grandmother gave me one hundred dollars to buy something to last. I bought the original version which has lasted all these years chopping garlic, peppers and onions nearly every night as well as grading cheese. I upgraded to the newer model only because the metal on the blade slightly rusted underneath from putting away wet. The newer version has metal on plastic that will eliminate rust. The original still works and I am having a hard time tossing it. Well made product.
customer_reviews.author: DianeLynne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I had a expensive Cuisinart which was lost in our move. I purchased this Oster and was so surprised how great it worked. Chops, slices, purée to perfection. Easy to clean, and the price is excellent. Worked better, easier to clean, lighter, than my Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Works but not easy clean up: Updated Changed to 1 Star
customer_reviews.text: Update: The mechanics of the spring down to allow operation broke. Renders it useless. Will not purchase low end product like this again. Going with KitchenAid in order to not fill up landfills with more plastic poor quality items like this, Pay more for better long lasting items!!! Original post: Works as expected but design of the spring area that pushes down with the cup as the safety start gets dirty and is difficult to clean seems like a poor design option in my opinion when it has to be replaced will look for better design.
customer_reviews.author: CDS Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Dough blade is very weak..breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I will give 2 rating to this product. I used to use this food processor mostly for dough making and dough blade broke twice.. on first dough blade breakage occasion it was in guarantee period so we could get it replaced and now guarantee is over and I am not finding this dough blade anywhere :(. Other than dough making everything is good.. like chopping, shredding, slicing etc...
customer_reviews.author: Your well wisher

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within a month of me getting it. Replaced it and it's stopped working 6 months after getting the replacement. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: GW5165

customer_reviews.title: Great helper
customer_reviews.text: This works great especially for the price. I dont think the more expensive ones will do any better. I made home made almond butter and pizza dough with it. The slicer is great even though I don't use it. Don't want to drag this out just for 1 cucumber or carrot. I can slice faster, just not as thin and uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Mimmers

customer_reviews.title: Functions Great
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning stinks, used it to chop cabbage and realized cabbage pieces got into the handle area so i had to lift the sring and fill it with water to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great processor for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these. Not because there was anything wrong with them, but because I'm military and move around quite a bit(every 6 months or so) so I gave the other one away to a coworker. The fact that is quite effective and has a low price tag has made this an easy choice for a food processor. I would definitely recommend. You can get other processors that have more feature, but you'd have to spend way more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on 9/14/19. Today, 11/3/19, it quit. Deader than a doornail. Very under impressed with this piece of equipment. I generally feel that Oster is supposedly a reputable company. This proves the lie to that. Will NOT buy any more Oster products.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without this! I have used it so many times already and it make my life so much easier. I highly recommend as it really takes up so little space and performs so many jobs easily.
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Broke and claims department never responded to me.
customer_reviews.text: The product works. The problem is I only owned it a couple of months and the component that pushes down the safety mechanism broke off and I have to stick a knife in that slot to push down the springs g so that it runs. I paid for warranty and filed a claim months ago and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: I. Dossul

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: Works great, everything was with it that was supposed to be. Great time saver. One leg is broken, for now I can pull on it and it will stay long enough to use it but I don't figure it will be long before I have to throw the whole thing away. There is a place in the shoot that collects bits of food (shredded zucchini) that you cannot clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Downs

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, has a few problems
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. When you are shoving food down the chute for chopping, the last bits of it drop parallel onto the blade, forcing you to stop and clear it out before you can continue. The circular blade is unwieldy. It will do basic chopping, but you get what you pay for. Unless you need something very basic and minimal that you don't use much, pay the extra money for a decent one.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Unit, don’t use it for cheese.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty powerful machine for the price. Maybe a little too powerful if that’s possible. I was shredding cheese and a piece ended up inside the lid where it won’t come out. Can’t take it apart there. Had worked great for everything else so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bagley

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself for Christmas and have used it twice. So far....no issues! It will be put to the test in the summer when I will be asked to bring my homemade coleslaw to parties and picnics. I am also looking forward to using the dough blade. I like to watch cooking shows and see more chefs using food processors than stand mixers to make dough. Clean up was a breeze as I wash all dishes by hand. Oster is a very good product, I have an Oster bread machine for about 15 years now and It still works great.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda workman

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great! Very similar to the previous one that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great! Very similar to the previous one that I owned, although I think this one might be quieter. I think the dishwasher might have warped the bowl and lid on my previous food processor, so I will just hand wash this one to avoid that mess again.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane W.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty and shiny!
customer_reviews.text: 😍 came right in time. My old blender needed an upgrade so I lost some of it's parts on purpose. This is always a nice way to start the new year. Potatoes greens, collard greens, you name it! To get the top on, you have to align it with the handle part first, then it clicks in. Omg I took too long trying to figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: WENWU COOPER

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't grate cheese well only good for chopping & pulsing
customer_reviews.text: This was my first food processor so I didn't know what to expect bought it after reading many reviews but beware if you are buying a food processor for slicing and cheese grating move on I grated cheddar cheese once and now if doesn't work, chops and pulses great.
customer_reviews.author: The Wiley's

customer_reviews.title: Plastic not sturdy broke.
customer_reviews.text: The container where it attaches & locks in to the motor has a plastic piece that activates the motor. Plastic? It broke. I'm surprised it lasted as long as it did. You have to use some force to make it lock down so plastic really! Otherwise this was a decent unit for the price. Sad that it broke because now I'm without a food processor. If it wasn't for the fact that it is useless now because of one small part I would give it a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this food processor
customer_reviews.text: Love this food processor. I did a lot of searching to find the best food processor. Taking in to account the price, everything it can do, and how well it works, it is a great deal. I did not want to buy anything expensive but I also did not want to waste my money on something that would not work well. This defied my expectations and I am so glad I ended up choosing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Siehr

customer_reviews.title: Great food processor for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to make hummus, chop veggies, slice carrots and look forward to making bread dough with it. It is powerful and my hummus is so much smoother than with what I was using before. It has a very short cord though, so you need to have it unplugged before you start the processing. The only issue I have with the short cord is that, if you are adding liquid while processing, it just barely clears the wall cabinet above it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Foti

customer_reviews.title: Delicate and breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Used this mixer for the second time to kneed some dough (it has the kneed setting and attachment) a couple minutes in the mixer started smoking and completely stopped working. Even though I’ve only used it twice I can’t return it or anything. Also there are so many small cut outs of the plastic it is very difficult to clean. So I guess only use this for light chopping and mixing very small amounts at a time. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie I

customer_reviews.title: Works incredible
customer_reviews.text: First time my wife made mashed potatoes with this I could swear they were boxed because this thing turned them into powder in no time. It comes apart easier than cheap models so its easy to clean. Unfortunate oversight with the holes on the handle, once food particles get in they are hard to get out
customer_reviews.author: Megan MacArthur

customer_reviews.title: Pizza is easy to make with this!
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to assemble and use, but the container seemed a bit flimsy, but none the less, Its great. I love the dough blade, I had to use it on the first day and made a pizza.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. We use it for many purposes as fit. The cup size is OK for our household size.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Asare

customer_reviews.title: Oster FPSTFP1355 2-Speed 10-Cup Food Processor
customer_reviews.text: Oster Food processor was the right size. Oster products are always top quality and durable. I recocomend this Oster food processor 100 %.
customer_reviews.author: mowreyta

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Package looked like it had been opened previously and repacked. It was missing a blade and my luck, it was the blade I needed that day. Sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: FOOD PROCESSOR WOULD NOT TURN ON "START"
customer_reviews.text: I have more time to cook and bought the processor in 2018 and finally took out of box and washed parts to do some baking and got it all set up and nothing when turned on start button. I would like to exchange or a credit for this item. I have a small processor so I had the knowledge to use it. Please help me with this delima. I would not think a delay of using this item was cause it not to work. Help!
customer_reviews.author: mark f.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I know what the description is, but I can never judge what a 10-cup anything is - so, with that said.. bigger then I thought which was a nice surprise and is quieter then my old one.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. L. R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s Ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the best inexpensive food processor that I’ve purchased, but it gets the job done. I’m not in love with how it grinds the food. The food is not very smooth when it’s done. It will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Sha L.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this little food processor. I use it almost daily, to chop and slice. I have yet to use it to knead dough. It works as it should and makes my life so much easier. Easy to clean, set up and store.
customer_reviews.author: Bergi

customer_reviews.title: Just a piece of plastic
customer_reviews.text: don't buy this it's just a piece of plastic Just tried this machine it should be laced JUNK. I can't return it past return date
customer_reviews.author: frankG

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. I bought it in December 2017 and I've used it maybe 3 times since. When I unboxed it I could tell it wasn't going to last long, but I expected to get more than 3 uses out of it. I took it out to use today and it would not turn on. It is extremely disappointing that this only came to my attention after the one year warranty expired. I will not be buying Oster products again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a little over a year. Bought in October 26, 2018. Died the week before Christmas, when I needed it the most. The plastic gears on the bottom of the bowl was worn out to the point where the motor would spin, but no action inside the bowl. Very disappointed. Can't even find a replacement bowl. ~Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Lu Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: good value for this kind of machine. I do have a few issues here and there, but I think they are my fault. I love the chop and shred on this. great for slaw. But i use mostly the blender part and it is wonderful for a raw began on a budget .
customer_reviews.author: Clay Everett

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was great
customer_reviews.text: Chopping Veg. Before the year was up, the teeth broke on the bowl. So far I haven't found a way to reach the company to order a bowl or teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sharp

customer_reviews.title: ... nervous every about buying this food processor but I LOVE it! It works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous every about buying this food processor but I LOVE it! It works perfectly! It does everything a food processor should do and has more settings than some more expensive ones. I love the large size as well. It works on large as well as small jobs! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Ferrin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: I used only once. Second time I tried, it did not work. I returned it!
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. The plastic piece at the shoot opening was chipped off into my food without my knowledge. Served it and someone got the piece. Also the handle has a spring part that food gets inside and rots. Cannot clean it as it’s inside the clear part. Don’t bother with this product, pay a little more for a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: I love this food processor!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I waited to review this item. I use the food processor heavily to shred zucchini at this time of the year.I have just finished shredding the first batch of zucchini from the garden. I am so impressed with this food processor! I didn't have to press down on the zucchini for it to be shredded. It just fed into the processor almost by itself. There is always juice in the bottom of the cup, but not this time. It did an incredible job! I've been using it for other things; crushing cashews and almonds for energy bites, and things like that. I love this food processor!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A.

customer_reviews.title: She did use the dough blade and it worked great. Good price too
customer_reviews.text: So far daughter-in law loves this machine, hope it does last. She did use the dough blade and it worked great. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Gooseylloosey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Needed a processor Mom’s walked away when she moved I’m slowly building her kitchen up
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Lifespan: less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a few times. When it worked, it worked like a charm. Less than a year after purchase, without any warning, it just quit. Don't waste your money unless you get a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel James

customer_reviews.title: Burnt second time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I used it to knead dough and it burnt second day of use. I returned it to amazon. I liked it for everything except kneading dough. No matter what I would do, dough would never get kneaded right.
customer_reviews.author: Urmila

customer_reviews.title: Quick for chese shredding but hard to take apart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought to mainly shred cheese. Works remarkably quick! Easy clean. But with my arthritis its hard to open to take off and clean.
customer_reviews.author: eg

customer_reviews.title: the food is stuck in the handle
customer_reviews.text: Since I have been using it the vegetables that I have been shredding have gotten stuck in the handle of the machine. I have tried to take the food out but I was unable to. The food will rot.
customer_reviews.author: Yaneysis Alcaz

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Works really good, but this is the first food processor I've ever owned so nothing to compare too
customer_reviews.author: BEazee

customer_reviews.title: not near as loud as some others
customer_reviews.text: We have had other food processors that were three times as loud as this one. The OSTER 2 speed, 10-cup processor works great and is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I tried to be open minded after reading the reviews, some people said this item was great, others said it was garbage. I'm sad to say that this item is definitely not worth the purchase, it's so cheaply made the plastic broke after two uses. Don't bother buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not the food processor you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Food gets stuck in a place in the lid you cannot clean. Gross, happened with first use. 2. Lid has to be installed perfectly to operate unit. Lid is not easy to install perfectly. 3. Said lid broke easily, now it doesn't work. Rather disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The machine wobbles when powered high and the motor seems like it’s about to die. Food gets stuck inside the handle. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DeathstarBallistics

customer_reviews.title: I have to hold on it and got the sense that this food processor would easily overheat. It's good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used this to knead bread. It will do. I have to hold on it and got the sense that this food processor would easily overheat. It's good for the price, just don't expect a sturdy machine that is going to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good value
customer_reviews.text: I use my processor every few days, dishwasher cleaned, it is sturdy good value.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger's Team

customer_reviews.title: It’s not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it, she bought it because she used her daughters. She has not used hers yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Used for 1 year - broken plastic stem under handle - now it won't work.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this is a common problem with these and i wish i had not purchased this item. Now only 1 year old and it broke off when i tried to lock down the lid. Poor design - don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: LBrezik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a good value
customer_reviews.text: For a relatively inexpensive food processor, this Oster gets the job done. It's easy to use, chops, slices and even kneads pretty handily. Kind of a pain to clean, frankly - there are multiple parts, all of which are kind of oddly shaped, but other than that, an effective kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie F

customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this product for my mom the plastic containers are very thin I’m guessing they will eventually crack however the base is very heavy and durable
customer_reviews.author: athina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Holds a lot and doesn’t waste after you chop up your food.
customer_reviews.author: hubbysgirl

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If I had known how well it works I would have ordered one years ago. Now I make coleslaw with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: bea

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable product.
customer_reviews.text: I used it a few times and now something inside the motor is slipping. It was lightly used and not abused. Its just cheap. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Would never purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst designed of any Oster product I have ever purchased. It cuts fine & has several different functions but it is to hard to clean & the two piece designed food chute is not great either.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The processor does the job, but the design leaves a lot to be desired. Food gets caught by the handle and there's really no way of getting it out. I've had other Oster products and been very happy which is why I went with this one. Not too pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sara

customer_reviews.title: Does it job
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to clean and very powerfull. Hope it lasts long
customer_reviews.author: Tamara sh

customer_reviews.title: Shipped non working unit.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this item after Thanksgiving. Tried to use this item 1st time before Christmas and it’s not working. They shipped me non working unit.
customer_reviews.author: Markus C.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine to knead dough
customer_reviews.text: I love it especially to knead the dough ( atta ) for my chapatti or Rotis. easy to clean and require less space to store
customer_reviews.author: Geetanjali

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: Product came not working, nothing happened when you pressed a button. It Just so conveniently happens that i declined the warrenty. Became target practice. The suction cups were helpful with that atleast. Dont buy this.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Wish I was able to use this but I wasn't never worked Never turned on just NOTHING and it was too late to return
customer_reviews.author: Reese P

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Wouldn't recommend buying it. It is cheaply made. I returned it and getting another better quality one (Hamilton Beach) and you don't have to snap the bowl in place.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Not to plug in until setup is complete
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to chop raw veggies, and shred hard cheeses and to make pesto.. I do have to hold down the button to chop, shred etc - otherwise machine stops.. Would like it better if machine would still operate without me having to hold down the button..
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Reidinger

customer_reviews.title: It was broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a month ago and I did not try it until this morning. It does not work at all. I tried different outlets, but it did not react at all. Also, I think someone used it before because the lid is not clean with some yellow stuff on it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Wanyun Yang

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: item was bought for Christmas and used 4 times. The motor stopped working in April.
customer_reviews.author: Derek B.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE! Awesome food processor for veggies, cheeses, etc. -- and the dough blade is so great I'm never mixing pizza or pastry crusts by hand again! Bought here on a big Black Friday sale, but would totally be worth the money at regular price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Tranby

customer_reviews.title: she loves to bake and says the dough hooks work wonderful on her bread dough
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for our Daughter.....she loves to bake and says the dough hooks work wonderful on her bread dough.
customer_reviews.author: Carpetshark

customer_reviews.title: Unit Design Flaw!
customer_reviews.text: After using this about 4 times only, the safety lock at the bottom bowl BROKE n the unit cannot be use anymore! This is definitely a DESIGN FLAW! What a waste of money! And I trusted this brand Oster! Never again! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Hmm used only twice and today I tried to use it won’t power on.huge waste of money so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: IT's fun and keeps u thinking.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! It works wonderfully! Haven't had the opportunity to try the other blade, but so far I am impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: beagle

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Set it up, plugged it in and doesn't even work. Tried every which way several times and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Lylna Thao

customer_reviews.title: Worked only 1 week
customer_reviews.text: This is the most useless processor. Broke after a week. Motor not working
customer_reviews.author: Tekada

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good. A piece of food did get stuck in ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once, but so far so good. A piece of food did get stuck in the handle, and it took me a few minutes to figure out how to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: LCN Jr

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Excellent processor. Works so well I purchased one for myself for my holiday baking
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: love it until 60 day's to the day it stopped working :(
customer_reviews.text: worked great and price was good too but now I have to replace it bc it's past 30 days and I have to pay so big bummer.
customer_reviews.author: It’s a Family Thing

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bough this for making pie dough and possible bread dough and so far it has been doing the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: pefry

product_meta.title: Oster FPSTFP1355 2-Speed 10-Cup Food Processor, 500-watt, Black
product_meta.description: Size:10-CupTake your culinary skills to a new level with the Oster 10-Cup Food Processor. Powered by a 500 watt motor, this electric food processor makes sure that many of your cooking tasks - including chopping, blending and grinding - are done in minutes. With two speed settings, this food processor gives you complete control over the food being processed. The pulse control lets you ensure the food is not over-processed.
feature_bullets: 500-Watt Motor with 2 Speeds and Pulse Control buttons
5" Wide, Large-Mouth Food Chute w/Food Pusher
10 Cup Capacity Work Bowl with locking lid
Refer the user manual below for proper usage instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,099 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
